post.author: 권경화
post.content: Please be aware that The Toronto Wireless User Group will be meeting from 9:00 a.m. until noon on Thursday February 17th to discuss Business Applications for the Mobile Worker. We will have guest speakers from PalmOne and Research in Motion. They will discuss issues concerning applications for RIM and Palm and examine applications and usage for the mobile worker. The meeting is free, and you are welcome to bring a guest. Directions to the seminar, as well as information on the speakers can be found at www.torwug.org. If you have not registered, and would like to join us, please go to http://torwug.org/local/register/register.asp Thank you TorWUG
post.title: The Toronto Wireless User Group Seminar
